assessmentRunArn.description: The ARN that specifies the assessment run for which you want to generate a report.

reportFileFormat.description: Specifies the file format (html or pdf) of the assessment report that you want to generate.

reportType.description: Specifies the type of the assessment report that you want to generate. There are two types of assessment reports: a finding report and a full report. For more information, see Assessment Reports.
